desc.1: The BEPP app is a tool designed to simplify the process of packaging cross-browser extensions.
desc.2: With BEPP, you can easily convert your extension for Safari, Chrome, Firefox, Edge, Brave, and other popular browsers, all from a single platform.
desc.3: In addition, the App allows you to search for extensions on the web and convert them. Forget about the complications of adapting your extension for each browser separately; BEPP makes it quick and easy so you can focus on what really matters.
